MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G42 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Sinclair Drive and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:45AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations work required on our underground cable network near to Old Victoria Hospital and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:32 PM on Tuesday, 15 December 2020.
